Translations.Text: Ami e'i nagarira sapatha kari
ebam e'i nagarite apanara upara kona pratibandhakata ne'i.
Sapatha janakera o ya janma deya.
Niscaya ami manusake sramanirbhararupe srsti karechi.
Se ki mane kare ye, tara upara ke'u ksamatabana habe na
se baleh ami pracura dhana-sampada byaya karechi.
Se ki mane kare ye, take ke'u dekheni
ami ki take de'ini caksudbaya
jihaba o osthadbaya
bastutah ami take duâ€™ti patha pradarsana karechi.
Atahpara se dharmera ghamtite prabesa kareni.
Apani janena, se ghamti ki
ta hacche dasamukti
athaba durbhiksera dine annadana.
Etima atbiyake
athaba dhuli-dhusarita misakinake
atahpara tadera antarbhukta ha'oya, yara imana ane ebam parasparake upadesa deya sabarera o upadesa deya dayara.
Tara'i saubhagyasali.
Ara yara amara ayatasamuha asbikara kare tara'i hatabhaga.
Tara agniparibestita abasthaya bandi thakabe.
